items: Melt the butter and chocolate in the microwave.
In a bowl, beat the eggs with the sugar with a rod.
Gradually integrate the flour into the mixture.
Smear the inside of a cup with butter and cover it with a little flour. This makes it easier to remove the coulant.
Put the coulant dough in the cup to fill a third. Put two milk chocolate bars and cover with more dough, leaving a finger of margin in the cup since the dough will rise.
Put the cup in the microwave at 800 W for 1 minute... And it will be ready to eat!.

description: To accompany this strong dessert, I recommend something refreshing such as some fruit with lemon juice and fresh herbs. This time we chose _oranges_ and _peppermint_.
items: Cut the oranges in _live segments_. In other words, peel the orange with a knife, removing the skin and the white part; and remove each slice (separated by the white membranes) with the knife.
Squeeze the leftover orange remains with your own hands. Combine this juice with the segments.
Finally, to give it even a fresher touch, chop a little peppermint.

description: Take into account that the coulant should be eaten when it is still hot and with the fresh dressing.
